summary: A chief of detectives, homicide section, kills his mistress and deliberately leaves clues to prove his own responsibility for the crime.
cast: Gian Maria Volontè|Florinda Bolkan|Gianni Santuccio|Orazio Orlando|Sergio Tramonti|Arturo Dominici|Aldo Rendine|Massimo Foschi|Aleka Paizi|Vittorio Duse|Pino Patti|Salvo Randone|Giuseppe Licastro|Filippo De Gara|Fulvio Grimaldi|Ugo Adinolfi|Franco Marletta|Giacomo Bellini|Giuseppe Terranova|Vincenzo Falanga|Roberto Bonanni|Guido Buzzelli|Gino Usai|Gianfranco Barra|Aristide Caporale|Ettore Geri|Alfonso Giganti|Franco Magno|Enrico Marciani|Enzo Mondino|Elio Petri|Mario Silvestri|Alessandro Tedeschi
keywords: years of lead|political satire|evil cop|male camaraderie|killer cop
title: Investigación sobre un ciudadano libre de toda sospecha
